{"pk": 3, "path": "000100010001", "depth": 3, "numchild": 0, "translation_key": "3440beaa-bbcf-4e81-8eea-db8dfb17f985", "locale": 1, "title": "The Rat Man Notes", "draft_title": "The Rat Man Notes", "slug": "the-rat-man-notes", "content_type": 61, "live": false, "has_unpublished_changes": false, "url_path": "/home/the-rat-man-notes/", "owner": 1, "seo_title": "", "show_in_menus": false, "search_description": "", "go_live_at": null, "expire_at": null, "expired": false, "locked": false, "locked_at": null, "locked_by": null, "first_published_at": null, "last_published_at": null, "latest_revision_created_at": null, "live_revision": null, "alias_of": null, "body": "[{\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Players introduced to [Jopepe the Trollmaster].

After briefed on the mission, Destroy the Rat Man, discover his hideout and return various artifacts, a messenger comes warning of a recent murder at one of the universities; Thule Institute of Technology

Teleported to the uni via infused magic mushrooms, where they meet [Professor Formagia Cudge PHD] who takes them to [Dr Naxira Menine]'s quarters, where her body lies - feasted on by rats.

The chamber has an antichamber with a trap which has not been set off, but the party are warned. A [Fractal Monomorphic Replicator] with a hidden keypad.

The corridor is made up of a large cylindrical drum with a gangway, connecting the antichamber with the study. The barrel is lined with arcane radiators and, although it is static, the whole chamber feels as if it is tumbling.

If the trap is set off...

Energy fills the chamber, and you begin to feel the flow of air pushing against you causing your hairs to stand on end and spark with static electricity... Your flesh begins to welt and intense heat wracks through your body... Parts of your body are fractally replicated, with the approriate nerve endings etc. Random table here.

Study is full of magic and science parafinalia including stacked crates and geo political maps of foreign places. There is a significant ammount of rats here, gnawing at the body. They avoid going near the trap.

The chamber has large stained glass windows, but they are too warbled to see through other than being able to make out some exterior lighting.

Skill Table

\", \"id\": \"f97f0a55-e569-4cba-b183-b098b6dfe960\"}, {\"type\": \"table\", \"value\": {\"data\": [[\"Perception 26\", \"A token of [Thimblewhipper]\"], [\"Perception 25\", \"Find a Secret door leading to outside\"], [\"Perception 20\", \"Fine tracks, bloody/muddy leading to the secret door\"], [\"Perception 15\", \"Ripped up newspaper articles from different newspapers, torn into thin long strips.\"], [\"Perception <10\", \"Wait then hear screaming/yelling from outside\"], [null, null]], \"cell\": [], \"first_row_is_table_header\": false, \"first_col_is_header\": false, \"table_caption\": \"\"}, \"id\": \"19a4b353-ce56-498b-beb1-765f53a88a8a\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Party goes outside, attacked by Ratman, or Ratman attacking [Fuxmup].

Ratman is far too well dressed for a ratling. They have gear that is too expensive (classist crap, rank party members).

\", \"id\": \"e53ab5be-818d-46f6-8cea-e77a96bba420\"}, {\"type\": \"table\", \"value\": {\"data\": [[\"Per\", \"Identifier of [Thimblewhipper] and his address\"], [\"\", \"Too well dressed\"], [\"\", \"Too well trained for fighting\"], [null, \"Notebook, half chewed.\"]], \"cell\": [], \"first_row_is_table_header\": false, \"first_col_is_header\": false, \"table_caption\": \"\"}, \"id\": \"b71203f9-bc58-4cf3-8bf7-6751436c4229\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

Fuxmup

After being saved from the rats, [Fuxmup] wants drugs to sell and use.

He hands the party his taking if they hand over some product.

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

He can offer to astral project for the party.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

Thoopthorpe's Workshop

(1, Front Outside, 2)

(2, Shopfront, 1-3)

(3, Backroom, 2-4)

(4, Back Alley, 3)

(5, Upstairs Hallway, 3-6-7)

(6, Back Alley - L1, 5)

(7,Workshop, 5-8)

(8, Front Outside - L1, 7)

Servitor - Authoritarian Opressor

{"pk": 3, "path": "000100010001", "depth": 3, "numchild": 0, "translation_key": "3440beaa-bbcf-4e81-8eea-db8dfb17f985", "locale": 1, "title": "The Rat Man Notes", "draft_title": "The Rat Man Notes", "slug": "the-rat-man-notes", "content_type": 61, "live": false, "has_unpublished_changes": true, "url_path": "/home/the-rat-man-notes/", "owner": 1, "seo_title": "", "show_in_menus": false, "search_description": "", "go_live_at": null, "expire_at": null, "expired": false, "locked": false, "locked_at": null, "locked_by": null, "first_published_at": null, "last_published_at": null, "latest_revision_created_at": "2021-10-23T13:49:47.143Z", "live_revision": null, "alias_of": null, "body": "[{\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Players introduced to [Jopepe the Trollmaster].

After briefed on the mission, Destroy the Rat Man, discover his hideout and return various artifacts, a messenger comes warning of a recent murder at one of the universities; Thule Institute of Technology

Teleported to the uni via infused magic mushrooms, where they meet [Professor Formagia Cudge PHD] who takes them to [Dr Naxira Menine]'s quarters, where her body lies - feasted on by rats.

The chamber has an antichamber with a trap which has not been set off, but the party are warned. A [Fractal Monomorphic Replicator] with a hidden keypad.

The corridor is made up of a large cylindrical drum with a gangway, connecting the antichamber with the study. The barrel is lined with arcane radiators and, although it is static, the whole chamber feels as if it is tumbling.

If the trap is set off...

Energy fills the chamber, and you begin to feel the flow of air pushing against you causing your hairs to stand on end and spark with static electricity... Your flesh begins to welt and intense heat wracks through your body... Parts of your body are fractally replicated, with the approriate nerve endings etc. Random table here.

Study is full of magic and science parafinalia including stacked crates and geo political maps of foreign places. There is a significant ammount of rats here, gnawing at the body. They avoid going near the trap.

The chamber has large stained glass windows, but they are too warbled to see through other than being able to make out some exterior lighting.

Skill Table

\", \"id\": \"f97f0a55-e569-4cba-b183-b098b6dfe960\"}, {\"type\": \"table\", \"value\": {\"data\": [[\"Perception 26\", \"A token of [Thimblewhipper]\"], [\"Perception 25\", \"Find a Secret door leading to outside\"], [\"Perception 20\", \"Fine tracks, bloody/muddy leading to the secret door\"], [\"Perception 15\", \"Ripped up newspaper articles from different newspapers, torn into thin long strips.\"], [\"Perception <10\", \"Wait then hear screaming/yelling from outside\"], [null, null]], \"cell\": [], \"first_row_is_table_header\": false, \"first_col_is_header\": false, \"table_caption\": \"\"}, \"id\": \"19a4b353-ce56-498b-beb1-765f53a88a8a\"}, {\"type\": \"table\", \"value\": {\"data\": [[\"Per\", \"Identifier of [Thimblewhipper] and his address\"], [\"\", \"Too well dressed\"], [\"\", \"Too well trained for fighting\"], [null, \"Notebook, half chewed.\"]], \"cell\": [], \"first_row_is_table_header\": false, \"first_col_is_header\": false, \"table_caption\": \"\"}, \"id\": \"b71203f9-bc58-4cf3-8bf7-6751436c4229\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Fuxmup

After being saved from the rats, [Fuxmup] wants drugs to sell and use.

He hands the party his taking if they hand over some product.

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

He can offer to astral project for the party.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

Thoopthorpe's Workshop

(1, Front Outside, 2)

(2, Shopfront, 1-3)

(3, Backroom, 2-4)

(4, Back Alley, 3)

(5, Upstairs Hallway, 3-6-7)

(6, Back Alley - L1, 5)

(7,Workshop, 5-8)

(8, Front Outside - L1, 7)

Servitor - Authoritarian Opressor

\", \"id\": \"313f651e-2317-4cfd-8238-fb3f00dc96ee\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"
  • Logic - Deduction
  • Encyclopedia - Trivia
  • Rhetoric - Discourse
  • Drama - Lies/Detection
  • Conceptualization - Art, Creativity
  • Visual Calculus - Observation and Abstraction
  • Volition - Morale
  • Inland Empire - Hunches
  • Empathy - Others
  • Authority - Assert yourself
  • Esprit de Corps - Group Pride
  • Suggestion - Charm
\", \"id\": \"7e786f33-9023-453b-8ec2-39ff5d47dc58\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Dialectics

Cheating -> Fairness

Oppression -> Liberty

Subversion -> Authority

Betrayal -> Loyalty

Harm -> Care

Degradation -> Sanctity

Myer Briggs

Heterodox - Orthodox - Contrarian

Hegemon/y

Thesis - Antithesis - Synthesis

Alt Left - Alt Center - Alt Right

Left - Center - Right

Isomorphism

Monomorphism

\", \"id\": \"56f96441-d2a6-4e90-a1bd-1530a9c7f268\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Party goes outside, attacked by Ratman, or Ratman attacking [Fuxmup].

Ratman is far too well dressed for a ratling. They have gear that is too expensive (classist crap, rank party members).

\", \"id\": \"e53ab5be-818d-46f6-8cea-e77a96bba420\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

{"pk": 6, "path": "000100010003", "depth": 3, "numchild": 0, "translation_key": "4c886bba-24fc-47e6-a323-1d9659cb1e04", "locale": 1, "title": "Title", "draft_title": "Title", "slug": "title", "content_type": 61, "live": true, "has_unpublished_changes": false, "url_path": "/home/title/", "owner": 1, "seo_title": "", "show_in_menus": false, "search_description": "", "go_live_at": null, "expire_at": null, "expired": false, "locked": false, "locked_at": null, "locked_by": null, "first_published_at": "2021-10-29T10:53:27.248Z", "last_published_at": "2021-10-29T10:53:27.248Z", "latest_revision_created_at": "2021-10-29T10:53:27.191Z", "live_revision": 61, "alias_of": null, "body": "[{\"type\": \"test\", \"value\": {\"left_column\": [{\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

The Rat

{"pk": 3, "path": "000100010001", "depth": 3, "numchild": 0, "translation_key": "3440beaa-bbcf-4e81-8eea-db8dfb17f985", "locale": 1, "title": "The Rat Man Notes", "draft_title": "The Rat Man Notes", "slug": "the-rat-man-notes", "content_type": 61, "live": true, "has_unpublished_changes": false, "url_path": "/home/the-rat-man-notes/", "owner": 1, "seo_title": "", "show_in_menus": false, "search_description": "", "go_live_at": null, "expire_at": null, "expired": false, "locked": false, "locked_at": null, "locked_by": null, "first_published_at": "2021-10-29T10:53:32.849Z", "last_published_at": "2021-10-29T10:53:32.849Z", "latest_revision_created_at": "2021-10-29T10:53:32.784Z", "live_revision": 62, "alias_of": null, "body": "[{\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

[Title]

Players introduced to [Jopepe the Trollmaster].

After briefed on the mission, Destroy the Rat Man, discover his hideout and return various artifacts, a messenger comes warning of a recent murder at one of the universities; Thule Institute of Technology

Teleported to the uni via infused magic mushrooms, where they meet [Professor Formagia Cudge PHD] who takes them to [Dr Naxira Menine]'s quarters, where her body lies - feasted on by rats.

The chamber has an antichamber with a trap which has not been set off, but the party are warned. A [Fractal Monomorphic Replicator] with a hidden keypad.

The corridor is made up of a large cylindrical drum with a gangway, connecting the antichamber with the study. The barrel is lined with arcane radiators and, although it is static, the whole chamber feels as if it is tumbling.

If the trap is set off...

Energy fills the chamber, and you begin to feel the flow of air pushing against you causing your hairs to stand on end and spark with static electricity... Your flesh begins to welt and intense heat wracks through your body... Parts of your body are fractally replicated, with the approriate nerve endings etc. Random table here.

Study is full of magic and science parafinalia including stacked crates and geo political maps of foreign places. There is a significant ammount of rats here, gnawing at the body. They avoid going near the trap.

The chamber has large stained glass windows, but they are too warbled to see through other than being able to make out some exterior lighting.

Skill Table

\", \"id\": \"f97f0a55-e569-4cba-b183-b098b6dfe960\"}, {\"type\": \"table\", \"value\": {\"data\": [[\"Perception 26\", \"A token of [Thimblewhipper]\"], [\"Perception 25\", \"Find a Secret door leading to outside\"], [\"Perception 20\", \"Fine tracks, bloody/muddy leading to the secret door\"], [\"Perception 15\", \"Ripped up newspaper articles from different newspapers, torn into thin long strips.\"], [\"Perception <10\", \"Wait then hear screaming/yelling from outside\"], [null, null]], \"cell\": [], \"first_row_is_table_header\": false, \"first_col_is_header\": false, \"table_caption\": \"\"}, \"id\": \"19a4b353-ce56-498b-beb1-765f53a88a8a\"}, {\"type\": \"table\", \"value\": {\"data\": [[\"Per\", \"Identifier of [Thimblewhipper] and his address\"], [\"\", \"Too well dressed\"], [\"\", \"Too well trained for fighting\"], [null, \"Notebook, half chewed.\"]], \"cell\": [], \"first_row_is_table_header\": false, \"first_col_is_header\": false, \"table_caption\": \"\"}, \"id\": \"b71203f9-bc58-4cf3-8bf7-6751436c4229\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Fuxmup

After being saved from the rats, [Fuxmup] wants drugs to sell and use.

He hands the party his taking if they hand over some product.

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

He can offer to astral project for the party.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

Thoopthorpe's Workshop

(1, Front Outside, 2)

(2, Shopfront, 1-3)

(3, Backroom, 2-4)

(4, Back Alley, 3)

(5, Upstairs Hallway, 3-6-7)

(6, Back Alley - L1, 5)

(7,Workshop, 5-8)

(8, Front Outside - L1, 7)

Servitor - Authoritarian Opressor

\", \"id\": \"313f651e-2317-4cfd-8238-fb3f00dc96ee\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"
  • Logic - Deduction
  • Encyclopedia - Trivia
  • Rhetoric - Discourse
  • Drama - Lies/Detection
  • Conceptualization - Art, Creativity
  • Visual Calculus - Observation and Abstraction
  • Volition - Morale
  • Inland Empire - Hunches
  • Empathy - Others
  • Authority - Assert yourself
  • Esprit de Corps - Group Pride
  • Suggestion - Charm
\", \"id\": \"7e786f33-9023-453b-8ec2-39ff5d47dc58\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Dialectics

Cheating -> Fairness

Oppression -> Liberty

Subversion -> Authority

Betrayal -> Loyalty

Harm -> Care

Degradation -> Sanctity

Myer Briggs

Heterodox - Orthodox - Contrarian

Hegemon/y

Thesis - Antithesis - Synthesis

Alt Left - Alt Center - Alt Right

Left - Center - Right

Isomorphism

Monomorphism

\", \"id\": \"56f96441-d2a6-4e90-a1bd-1530a9c7f268\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Party goes outside, attacked by Ratman, or Ratman attacking [Fuxmup].

Ratman is far too well dressed for a ratling. They have gear that is too expensive (classist crap, rank party members).

\", \"id\": \"e53ab5be-818d-46f6-8cea-e77a96bba420\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

{"pk": 3, "path": "000100010001", "depth": 3, "numchild": 0, "translation_key": "3440beaa-bbcf-4e81-8eea-db8dfb17f985", "locale": 1, "title": "The Rat Man Notes", "draft_title": "The Rat Man Notes", "slug": "the-rat-man-notes", "content_type": 61, "live": true, "has_unpublished_changes": false, "url_path": "/home/the-rat-man-notes/", "owner": 1, "seo_title": "", "show_in_menus": false, "search_description": "", "go_live_at": null, "expire_at": null, "expired": false, "locked": false, "locked_at": null, "locked_by": null, "first_published_at": "2021-10-29T10:53:32.849Z", "last_published_at": "2021-10-29T10:57:11.465Z", "latest_revision_created_at": "2021-10-29T10:57:11.409Z", "live_revision": 67, "alias_of": null, "body": "[{\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Players introduced to Jopepe the Trollmaster.

After briefed on the mission, Destroy the Rat Man, discover his hideout and return various artifacts, a messenger comes warning of a recent murder at one of the universities; Thule Institute of Technology

Teleported to the uni via infused magic mushrooms, where they meet Professor Formagia Cudge PHD who takes them to Dr Naxira Menine's quarters, where her body lies - feasted on by rats.

The chamber has an antichamber with a trap which has not been set off, but the party are warned. A Fractal Monomorphic Replicator with a hidden keypad.

The corridor is made up of a large cylindrical drum with a gangway, connecting the antichamber with the study. The barrel is lined with arcane radiators and, although it is static, the whole chamber feels as if it is tumbling.

If the trap is set off...

Energy fills the chamber, and you begin to feel the flow of air pushing against you causing your hairs to stand on end and spark with static electricity... Your flesh begins to welt and intense heat wracks through your body... Parts of your body are fractally replicated, with the approriate nerve endings etc. Random table here.

Study is full of magic and science parafinalia including stacked crates and geo political maps of foreign places. There is a significant ammount of rats here, gnawing at the body. They avoid going near the trap.

The chamber has large stained glass windows, but they are too warbled to see through other than being able to make out some exterior lighting.

Skill Table

\", \"id\": \"f97f0a55-e569-4cba-b183-b098b6dfe960\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Teleported to the uni via infused magic mushrooms, where they meet Professor Formagia Cudge PHD who takes them to Dr Naxira Menine's quarters, where her body lies - feasted on by rats.

The chamber has an antichamber with a trap which has not been set off, but the party are warned. A Fractal Monomorphic Replicator with a hidden keypad.

The corridor is made up of a large cylindrical drum with a gangway, connecting the antichamber with the study. The barrel is lined with arcane radiators and, although it is static, the whole chamber feels as if it is tumbling.

If the trap is set off...

Energy fills the chamber, and you begin to feel the flow of air pushing against you causing your hairs to stand on end and spark with static electricity... Your flesh begins to welt and intense heat wracks through your body... Parts of your body are fractally replicated, with the approriate nerve endings etc. Random table here.

Study is full of magic and science parafinalia including stacked crates and geo political maps of foreign places. There is a significant ammount of rats here, gnawing at the body. They avoid going near the trap.

The chamber has large stained glass windows, but they are too warbled to see through other than being able to make out some exterior lighting.

Skill Table

\", \"id\": \"dce6fdcb-6c94-4380-bc4c-982fb5cde93d\"}, {\"type\": \"table\", \"value\": {\"data\": [[\"Perception 26\", \"A token of [Thimblewhipper]\"], [\"Perception 25\", \"Find a Secret door leading to outside\"], [\"Perception 20\", \"Fine tracks, bloody/muddy leading to the secret door\"], [\"Perception 15\", \"Ripped up newspaper articles from different newspapers, torn into thin long strips.\"], [\"Perception <10\", \"Wait then hear screaming/yelling from outside\"], [null, null]], \"cell\": [], \"first_row_is_table_header\": false, \"first_col_is_header\": false, \"table_caption\": \"\"}, \"id\": \"19a4b353-ce56-498b-beb1-765f53a88a8a\"}, {\"type\": \"table\", \"value\": {\"data\": [[\"Per\", \"Identifier of [Thimblewhipper] and his address\"], [\"\", \"Too well dressed\"], [\"\", \"Too well trained for fighting\"], [null, \"Notebook, half chewed.\"]], \"cell\": [], \"first_row_is_table_header\": false, \"first_col_is_header\": false, \"table_caption\": \"\"}, \"id\": \"b71203f9-bc58-4cf3-8bf7-6751436c4229\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Fuxmup

After being saved from the rats, Fuxmup wants drugs to sell and use.

He hands the party his taking if they hand over some product.

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

He can offer to astral project for the party.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

Thoopthorpe's Workshop

(1, Front Outside, 2)

(2, Shopfront, 1-3)

(3, Backroom, 2-4)

(4, Back Alley, 3)

(5, Upstairs Hallway, 3-6-7)

(6, Back Alley - L1, 5)

(7,Workshop, 5-8)

(8, Front Outside - L1, 7)

Servitor - Authoritarian Opressor

\", \"id\": \"313f651e-2317-4cfd-8238-fb3f00dc96ee\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"
  • Logic - Deduction
  • Encyclopedia - Trivia
  • Rhetoric - Discourse
  • Drama - Lies/Detection
  • Conceptualization - Art, Creativity
  • Visual Calculus - Observation and Abstraction
  • Volition - Morale
  • Inland Empire - Hunches
  • Empathy - Others
  • Authority - Assert yourself
  • Esprit de Corps - Group Pride
  • Suggestion - Charm
\", \"id\": \"7e786f33-9023-453b-8ec2-39ff5d47dc58\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Dialectics

Cheating -> Fairness

Oppression -> Liberty

Subversion -> Authority

Betrayal -> Loyalty

Harm -> Care

Degradation -> Sanctity

Myer Briggs

Heterodox - Orthodox - Contrarian

Hegemon/y

Thesis - Antithesis - Synthesis

Alt Left - Alt Center - Alt Right

Left - Center - Right

Isomorphism

Monomorphism

\", \"id\": \"56f96441-d2a6-4e90-a1bd-1530a9c7f268\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Party goes outside, attacked by Ratman, or Ratman attacking Fuxmup.

Ratman is far too well dressed for a ratling. They have gear that is too expensive (classist crap, rank party members).

\", \"id\": \"e53ab5be-818d-46f6-8cea-e77a96bba420\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

The chamber has large stained glass windows, but they are too warbled to see through other than being able to make out some exterior lighting.

Skill Table

\", \"id\": \"dce6fdcb-6c94-4380-bc4c-982fb5cde93d\"}, {\"type\": \"table\", \"value\": {\"data\": [[\"Perception 26\", \"A token of [Thimblewhipper]\"], [\"Perception 25\", \"Find a Secret door leading to outside\"], [\"Perception 20\", \"Fine tracks, bloody/muddy leading to the secret door\"], [\"Perception 15\", \"Ripped up newspaper articles from different newspapers, torn into thin long strips.\"], [\"Perception <10\", \"Wait then hear screaming/yelling from outside\"], [null, null]], \"cell\": [], \"first_row_is_table_header\": false, \"first_col_is_header\": false, \"table_caption\": \"\"}, \"id\": \"19a4b353-ce56-498b-beb1-765f53a88a8a\"}, {\"type\": \"table\", \"value\": {\"data\": [[\"Per\", \"Identifier of [Thimblewhipper] and his address\"], [\"\", \"Too well dressed\"], [\"\", \"Too well trained for fighting\"], [null, \"Notebook, half chewed.\"]], \"cell\": [], \"first_row_is_table_header\": false, \"first_col_is_header\": false, \"table_caption\": \"\"}, \"id\": \"b71203f9-bc58-4cf3-8bf7-6751436c4229\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Fuxmup

After being saved from the rats, Fuxmup wants drugs to sell and use.

He hands the party his taking if they hand over some product.

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

He can offer to astral project for the party.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

Thoopthorpe's Workshop

(1, Front Outside, 2)

(2, Shopfront, 1-3)

(3, Backroom, 2-4)

(4, Back Alley, 3)

(5, Upstairs Hallway, 3-6-7)

(6, Back Alley - L1, 5)

(7,Workshop, 5-8)

(8, Front Outside - L1, 7)

Servitor - Authoritarian Opressor

\", \"id\": \"313f651e-2317-4cfd-8238-fb3f00dc96ee\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"
  • Logic - Deduction
  • Encyclopedia - Trivia
  • Rhetoric - Discourse
  • Drama - Lies/Detection
  • Conceptualization - Art, Creativity
  • Visual Calculus - Observation and Abstraction
  • Volition - Morale
  • Inland Empire - Hunches
  • Empathy - Others
  • Authority - Assert yourself
  • Esprit de Corps - Group Pride
  • Suggestion - Charm
\", \"id\": \"7e786f33-9023-453b-8ec2-39ff5d47dc58\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Dialectics

Cheating -> Fairness

Oppression -> Liberty

Subversion -> Authority

Betrayal -> Loyalty

Harm -> Care

Degradation -> Sanctity

Myer Briggs

Heterodox - Orthodox - Contrarian

Hegemon/y

Thesis - Antithesis - Synthesis

Alt Left - Alt Center - Alt Right

Left - Center - Right

Isomorphism

Monomorphism

\", \"id\": \"56f96441-d2a6-4e90-a1bd-1530a9c7f268\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Party goes outside, attacked by Ratman, or Ratman attacking Fuxmup.

Ratman is far too well dressed for a ratling. They have gear that is too expensive (classist crap, rank party members).

\", \"id\": \"e53ab5be-818d-46f6-8cea-e77a96bba420\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

{"pk": 22, "path": "00010001000C0005", "depth": 4, "numchild": 0, "translation_key": "e1199025-9fb2-4716-9203-c8f7c56854dd", "locale": 1, "title": "University", "draft_title": "University", "slug": "university", "content_type": 61, "live": true, "has_unpublished_changes": false, "url_path": "/home/chapter/university/", "owner": null, "seo_title": "", "show_in_menus": false, "search_description": "", "go_live_at": null, "expire_at": null, "expired": false, "locked": false, "locked_at": null, "locked_by": null, "first_published_at": null, "last_published_at": null, "latest_revision_created_at": null, "live_revision": null, "alias_of": null, "body": "[{\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Where they meet Professor Formagia Cudge PHD who takes them to Dr Naxira Menine's quarters, where her body lies - feasted on by rats.

The chamber has an antichamber with a trap which has not been set off, but the party are warned. A Fractal Monomorphic Replicator with a hidden keypad.

The corridor is made up of a large cylindrical drum with a gangway, connecting the antichamber with the study. The barrel is lined with arcane radiators and, although it is static, the whole chamber feels as if it is tumbling.

If the trap is set off...

Energy fills the chamber, and you begin to feel the flow of air pushing against you causing your hairs to stand on end and spark with static electricity... Your flesh begins to welt and intense heat wracks through your body... Parts of your body are fractally replicated, with the approriate nerve endings etc. Random table here.

Study is full of magic and science parafinalia including stacked crates and geo political maps of foreign places. There is a significant ammount of rats here, gnawing at the body. They avoid going near the trap.

The chamber has large stained glass windows, but they are too warbled to see through other than being able to make out some exterior lighting.

Skill Table

\", \"id\": \"3f1745e1-fce0-41f0-975e-e5955ec3efde\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

{"pk": 22, "path": "00010001000C0005", "depth": 4, "numchild": 0, "translation_key": "e1199025-9fb2-4716-9203-c8f7c56854dd", "locale": 1, "title": "University", "draft_title": "University", "slug": "university", "content_type": 61, "live": true, "has_unpublished_changes": true, "url_path": "/home/chapter/university/", "owner": null, "seo_title": "", "show_in_menus": false, "search_description": "", "go_live_at": null, "expire_at": null, "expired": false, "locked": false, "locked_at": null, "locked_by": null, "first_published_at": null, "last_published_at": null, "latest_revision_created_at": "2021-10-30T12:00:42.602Z", "live_revision": null, "alias_of": null, "body": "[{\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

The chamber has an antichamber with a trap which has not been set off, but the party are warned. A Fractal Monomorphic Replicator with a hidden keypad.

The corridor is made up of a large cylindrical drum with a gangway, connecting the antichamber with the study. The barrel is lined with arcane radiators and, although it is static, the whole chamber feels as if it is tumbling.

Energy fills the chamber, and you begin to feel the flow of air pushing against you causing your hairs to stand on end and spark with static electricity... Your flesh begins to welt and intense heat wracks through your body... Parts of your body are fractally replicated, with the approriate nerve endings etc. Random table here.

Skill Table

\", \"id\": \"3f1745e1-fce0-41f0-975e-e5955ec3efde\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Fuxmup

After being saved from the rats, Fuxmup wants drugs to sell and use.

He hands the party his taking if they hand over some product.

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

He can offer to astral project for the party.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

Workshop

\", \"id\": \"864dc321-fe89-40fe-9bdf-4c8aa2c13511\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

{"pk": 3, "path": "000100010001", "depth": 3, "numchild": 0, "translation_key": "3440beaa-bbcf-4e81-8eea-db8dfb17f985", "locale": 1, "title": "The Rat Man Notes", "draft_title": "The Rat Man Notes", "slug": "the-rat-man-notes", "content_type": 61, "live": true, "has_unpublished_changes": true, "url_path": "/home/the-rat-man-notes/", "owner": 1, "seo_title": "", "show_in_menus": false, "search_description": "", "go_live_at": null, "expire_at": null, "expired": false, "locked": false, "locked_at": null, "locked_by": null, "first_published_at": "2021-10-29T10:53:32.849Z", "last_published_at": "2021-10-29T10:57:11.465Z", "latest_revision_created_at": "2021-10-30T11:27:54.156Z", "live_revision": 67, "alias_of": null, "body": "[{\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"\", \"id\": \"dce6fdcb-6c94-4380-bc4c-982fb5cde93d\"}, {\"type\": \"table\", \"value\": {\"data\": [[\"Perception 26\", \"A token of [Thimblewhipper]\"], [\"Perception 25\", \"Find a Secret door leading to outside\"], [\"Perception 20\", \"Fine tracks, bloody/muddy leading to the secret door\"], [\"Perception 15\", \"Ripped up newspaper articles from different newspapers, torn into thin long strips.\"], [\"Perception <10\", \"Wait then hear screaming/yelling from outside\"], [null, null]], \"cell\": [], \"first_row_is_table_header\": false, \"first_col_is_header\": false, \"table_caption\": \"\"}, \"id\": \"19a4b353-ce56-498b-beb1-765f53a88a8a\"}, {\"type\": \"table\", \"value\": {\"data\": [[\"Per\", \"Identifier of [Thimblewhipper] and his address\"], [\"\", \"Too well dressed\"], [\"\", \"Too well trained for fighting\"], [null, \"Notebook, half chewed.\"]], \"cell\": [], \"first_row_is_table_header\": false, \"first_col_is_header\": false, \"table_caption\": \"\"}, \"id\": \"b71203f9-bc58-4cf3-8bf7-6751436c4229\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Fuxmup

After being saved from the rats, Fuxmup wants drugs to sell and use.

He hands the party his taking if they hand over some product.

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

He can offer to astral project for the party.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

\", \"id\": \"313f651e-2317-4cfd-8238-fb3f00dc96ee\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"
  • Logic - Deduction
  • Encyclopedia - Trivia
  • Rhetoric - Discourse
  • Drama - Lies/Detection
  • Conceptualization - Art, Creativity
  • Visual Calculus - Observation and Abstraction
  • Volition - Morale
  • Inland Empire - Hunches
  • Empathy - Others
  • Authority - Assert yourself
  • Esprit de Corps - Group Pride
  • Suggestion - Charm
\", \"id\": \"7e786f33-9023-453b-8ec2-39ff5d47dc58\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Dialectics

Cheating -> Fairness

Oppression -> Liberty

Subversion -> Authority

Betrayal -> Loyalty

Harm -> Care

Degradation -> Sanctity

Myer Briggs

Heterodox - Orthodox - Contrarian

Hegemon/y

Thesis - Antithesis - Synthesis

Alt Left - Alt Center - Alt Right

Left - Center - Right

Isomorphism

Monomorphism

\", \"id\": \"56f96441-d2a6-4e90-a1bd-1530a9c7f268\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Party goes outside, attacked by Ratman, or Ratman attacking Fuxmup.

Ratman is far too well dressed for a ratling. They have gear that is too expensive (classist crap, rank party members).

\", \"id\": \"e53ab5be-818d-46f6-8cea-e77a96bba420\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

{"pk": 22, "path": "00010001000C0005", "depth": 4, "numchild": 0, "translation_key": "e1199025-9fb2-4716-9203-c8f7c56854dd", "locale": 1, "title": "University", "draft_title": "University", "slug": "university", "content_type": 61, "live": true, "has_unpublished_changes": true, "url_path": "/home/chapter/university/", "owner": null, "seo_title": "", "show_in_menus": false, "search_description": "", "go_live_at": null, "expire_at": null, "expired": false, "locked": false, "locked_at": null, "locked_by": null, "first_published_at": null, "last_published_at": null, "latest_revision_created_at": "2021-10-30T12:01:42.724Z", "live_revision": null, "alias_of": null, "body": "[{\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Where they meet Professor Formagia Cudge PHD who takes them to Dr Naxira Menine's quarters, where her body lies - feasted on by rats.

The chamber has an antichamber with a trap which has not been set off, but the party are warned. A Fractal Monomorphic Replicator with a hidden keypad.

The corridor is made up of a large cylindrical drum with a gangway, connecting the antichamber with the study. The barrel is lined with arcane radiators and, although it is static, the whole chamber feels as if it is tumbling.

If the trap is set off...

Energy fills the chamber, and you begin to feel the flow of air pushing against you causing your hairs to stand on end and spark with static electricity... Your flesh begins to welt and intense heat wracks through your body... Parts of your body are fractally replicated, with the approriate nerve endings etc. Random table here.

Study is full of magic and science parafinalia including stacked crates and geo political maps of foreign places. There is a significant ammount of rats here, gnawing at the body. They avoid going near the trap.

The chamber has large stained glass windows, but they are too warbled to see through other than being able to make out some exterior lighting.

Skill Table

\", \"id\": \"3f1745e1-fce0-41f0-975e-e5955ec3efde\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Fuxmup

After being saved from the rats, Fuxmup wants drugs to sell and use.

He hands the party his taking if they hand over some product.

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

He can offer to astral project for the party.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

Workshop

\", \"id\": \"864dc321-fe89-40fe-9bdf-4c8aa2c13511\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

Where they meet Professor Formagia Cudge PHD who takes them to Dr Naxira Menine's quarters, where her body lies - feasted on by rats.

The chamber has an antichamber with a trap which has not been set off, but the party are warned. A Fractal Monomorphic Replicator with a hidden keypad.

The corridor is made up of a large cylindrical drum with a gangway, connecting the antichamber with the study. The barrel is lined with arcane radiators and, although it is static, the whole chamber feels as if it is tumbling.

If the trap is set off...

Energy fills the chamber, and you begin to feel the flow of air pushing against you causing your hairs to stand on end and spark with static electricity... Your flesh begins to welt and intense heat wracks through your body... Parts of your body are fractally replicated, with the approriate nerve endings etc. Random table here.

Study is full of magic and science parafinalia including stacked crates and geo political maps of foreign places. There is a significant ammount of rats here, gnawing at the body. They avoid going near the trap.

The chamber has large stained glass windows, but they are too warbled to see through other than being able to make out some exterior lighting.

Skill Table

\", \"id\": \"3f1745e1-fce0-41f0-975e-e5955ec3efde\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Fuxmup

After being saved from the rats, Fuxmup wants drugs to sell and use.

He hands the party his taking if they hand over some product.

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

He can offer to astral project for the party.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

Workshop

\", \"id\": \"864dc321-fe89-40fe-9bdf-4c8aa2c13511\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

The corridor is made up of a large cylindrical drum with a gangway, connecting the antichamber with the study. The barrel is lined with arcane radiators and, although it is static, the whole chamber feels as if it is tumbling.

If the trap is set off...

Energy fills the chamber, and you begin to feel the flow of air pushing against you causing your hairs to stand on end and spark with static electricity... Your flesh begins to welt and intense heat wracks through your body... Parts of your body are fractally replicated, with the approriate nerve endings etc. Random table here.

Study is full of magic and science parafinalia including stacked crates and geo political maps of foreign places. There is a significant ammount of rats here, gnawing at the body. They avoid going near the trap.

The chamber has large stained glass windows, but they are too warbled to see through other than being able to make out some exterior lighting.

Skill Table

\", \"id\": \"3f1745e1-fce0-41f0-975e-e5955ec3efde\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Fuxmup

After being saved from the rats, Fuxmup wants drugs to sell and use.

He hands the party his taking if they hand over some product.

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

He can offer to astral project for the party.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

Workshop

\", \"id\": \"864dc321-fe89-40fe-9bdf-4c8aa2c13511\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

After being saved from the rats, Fuxmup wants drugs to sell and use.

He hands the party his taking if they hand over some product.

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

He can offer to astral project for the party.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

Workshop

\", \"id\": \"864dc321-fe89-40fe-9bdf-4c8aa2c13511\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

{"pk": 22, "path": "00010001000C0005", "depth": 4, "numchild": 0, "translation_key": "e1199025-9fb2-4716-9203-c8f7c56854dd", "locale": 1, "title": "University", "draft_title": "University", "slug": "university", "content_type": 61, "live": true, "has_unpublished_changes": true, "url_path": "/home/chapter/university/", "owner": null, "seo_title": "", "show_in_menus": false, "search_description": "", "go_live_at": null, "expire_at": null, "expired": false, "locked": false, "locked_at": null, "locked_by": null, "first_published_at": null, "last_published_at": null, "latest_revision_created_at": "2021-10-30T12:09:17.950Z", "live_revision": null, "alias_of": null, "body": "[{\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Where they meet Professor Formagia Cudge PHD who takes them to Dr Naxira Menine's quarters, where her body lies - feasted on by rats.

The chamber has an antichamber with a trap which has not been set off, but the party are warned. A Fractal Monomorphic Replicator with a hidden keypad.

The corridor is made up of a large cylindrical drum with a gangway, connecting the antichamber with the study. The barrel is lined with arcane radiators and, although it is static, the whole chamber feels as if it is tumbling.

If the trap is set off...

Energy fills the chamber, and you begin to feel the flow of air pushing against you causing your hairs to stand on end and spark with static electricity... Your flesh begins to welt and intense heat wracks through your body... Parts of your body are fractally replicated, with the approriate nerve endings etc. Random table here.

Study is full of magic and science parafinalia including stacked crates and geo political maps of foreign places. There is a significant ammount of rats here, gnawing at the body. They avoid going near the trap.

The chamber has large stained glass windows, but they are too warbled to see through other than being able to make out some exterior lighting.

Skill Table

\", \"id\": \"3f1745e1-fce0-41f0-975e-e5955ec3efde\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

He hands the party his taking if they hand over some product.

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

He can offer to astral project for the party.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

Workshop

\", \"id\": \"864dc321-fe89-40fe-9bdf-4c8aa2c13511\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

{"pk": 22, "path": "00010001000C0005", "depth": 4, "numchild": 0, "translation_key": "e1199025-9fb2-4716-9203-c8f7c56854dd", "locale": 1, "title": "University", "draft_title": "University", "slug": "university", "content_type": 61, "live": true, "has_unpublished_changes": true, "url_path": "/home/chapter/university/", "owner": null, "seo_title": "", "show_in_menus": false, "search_description": "", "go_live_at": null, "expire_at": null, "expired": false, "locked": false, "locked_at": null, "locked_by": null, "first_published_at": null, "last_published_at": null, "latest_revision_created_at": "2021-10-30T12:09:18.060Z", "live_revision": null, "alias_of": null, "body": "[{\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Where they meet Professor Formagia Cudge PHD who takes them to Dr Naxira Menine's quarters, where her body lies - feasted on by rats.

The chamber has an antichamber with a trap which has not been set off, but the party are warned. A Fractal Monomorphic Replicator with a hidden keypad.

The corridor is made up of a large cylindrical drum with a gangway, connecting the antichamber with the study. The barrel is lined with arcane radiators and, although it is static, the whole chamber feels as if it is tumbling.

If the trap is set off...

Energy fills the chamber, and you begin to feel the flow of air pushing against you causing your hairs to stand on end and spark with static electricity... Your flesh begins to welt and intense heat wracks through your body... Parts of your body are fractally replicated, with the approriate nerve endings etc. Random table here.

Study is full of magic and science parafinalia including stacked crates and geo political maps of foreign places. There is a significant ammount of rats here, gnawing at the body. They avoid going near the trap.

The chamber has large stained glass windows, but they are too warbled to see through other than being able to make out some exterior lighting.

Skill Table

\", \"id\": \"3f1745e1-fce0-41f0-975e-e5955ec3efde\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Fuxmup

After being saved from the rats, Fuxmup wants drugs to sell and use.

He hands the party his taking if they hand over some product.

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

He can offer to astral project for the party.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

Workshop

\", \"id\": \"864dc321-fe89-40fe-9bdf-4c8aa2c13511\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

The chamber has an antichamber with a trap which has not been set off, but the party are warned. A Fractal Monomorphic Replicator with a hidden keypad.

The corridor is made up of a large cylindrical drum with a gangway, connecting the antichamber with the study. The barrel is lined with arcane radiators and, although it is static, the whole chamber feels as if it is tumbling.

If the trap is set off...

Energy fills the chamber, and you begin to feel the flow of air pushing against you causing your hairs to stand on end and spark with static electricity... Your flesh begins to welt and intense heat wracks through your body... Parts of your body are fractally replicated, with the approriate nerve endings etc. Random table here.

Study is full of magic and science parafinalia including stacked crates and geo political maps of foreign places. There is a significant ammount of rats here, gnawing at the body. They avoid going near the trap.

The chamber has large stained glass windows, but they are too warbled to see through other than being able to make out some exterior lighting.

Skill Table

\", \"id\": \"3f1745e1-fce0-41f0-975e-e5955ec3efde\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Fuxmup

After being saved from the rats, Fuxmup wants drugs to sell and use.

He hands the party his taking if they hand over some product.

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

He can offer to astral project for the party.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

Workshop

\", \"id\": \"864dc321-fe89-40fe-9bdf-4c8aa2c13511\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

The corridor is made up of a large cylindrical drum with a gangway, connecting the antichamber with the study. The barrel is lined with arcane radiators and, although it is static, the whole chamber feels as if it is tumbling.

If the trap is set off...

Energy fills the chamber, and you begin to feel the flow of air pushing against you causing your hairs to stand on end and spark with static electricity... Your flesh begins to welt and intense heat wracks through your body... Parts of your body are fractally replicated, with the approriate nerve endings etc. Random table here.

Study is full of magic and science parafinalia including stacked crates and geo political maps of foreign places. There is a significant ammount of rats here, gnawing at the body. They avoid going near the trap.

The chamber has large stained glass windows, but they are too warbled to see through other than being able to make out some exterior lighting.

Skill Table

\", \"id\": \"3f1745e1-fce0-41f0-975e-e5955ec3efde\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Fuxmup

After being saved from the rats, Fuxmup wants drugs to sell and use.

He hands the party his taking if they hand over some product.

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

He can offer to astral project for the party.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

Workshop

\", \"id\": \"864dc321-fe89-40fe-9bdf-4c8aa2c13511\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

After being saved from the rats, Fuxmup wants drugs to sell and use.

He hands the party his taking if they hand over some product.

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

He can offer to astral project for the party.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

Workshop

\", \"id\": \"864dc321-fe89-40fe-9bdf-4c8aa2c13511\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

{"pk": 22, "path": "00010001000C0005", "depth": 4, "numchild": 0, "translation_key": "e1199025-9fb2-4716-9203-c8f7c56854dd", "locale": 1, "title": "University", "draft_title": "University", "slug": "university", "content_type": 61, "live": true, "has_unpublished_changes": true, "url_path": "/home/chapter/university/", "owner": null, "seo_title": "", "show_in_menus": false, "search_description": "", "go_live_at": null, "expire_at": null, "expired": false, "locked": false, "locked_at": null, "locked_by": null, "first_published_at": null, "last_published_at": null, "latest_revision_created_at": "2021-10-30T12:09:18.384Z", "live_revision": null, "alias_of": null, "body": "[{\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Where they meet Professor Formagia Cudge PHD who takes them to Dr Naxira Menine's quarters, where her body lies - feasted on by rats.

The chamber has an antichamber with a trap which has not been set off, but the party are warned. A Fractal Monomorphic Replicator with a hidden keypad.

The corridor is made up of a large cylindrical drum with a gangway, connecting the antichamber with the study. The barrel is lined with arcane radiators and, although it is static, the whole chamber feels as if it is tumbling.

If the trap is set off...

Energy fills the chamber, and you begin to feel the flow of air pushing against you causing your hairs to stand on end and spark with static electricity... Your flesh begins to welt and intense heat wracks through your body... Parts of your body are fractally replicated, with the approriate nerve endings etc. Random table here.

Study is full of magic and science parafinalia including stacked crates and geo political maps of foreign places. There is a significant ammount of rats here, gnawing at the body. They avoid going near the trap.

The chamber has large stained glass windows, but they are too warbled to see through other than being able to make out some exterior lighting.

Skill Table

\", \"id\": \"3f1745e1-fce0-41f0-975e-e5955ec3efde\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

He can offer to astral project for the party.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

Workshop

\", \"id\": \"864dc321-fe89-40fe-9bdf-4c8aa2c13511\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

{"pk": 22, "path": "00010001000C0005", "depth": 4, "numchild": 0, "translation_key": "e1199025-9fb2-4716-9203-c8f7c56854dd", "locale": 1, "title": "University", "draft_title": "University", "slug": "university", "content_type": 61, "live": true, "has_unpublished_changes": true, "url_path": "/home/chapter/university/", "owner": null, "seo_title": "", "show_in_menus": false, "search_description": "", "go_live_at": null, "expire_at": null, "expired": false, "locked": false, "locked_at": null, "locked_by": null, "first_published_at": null, "last_published_at": null, "latest_revision_created_at": "2021-10-30T12:09:18.491Z", "live_revision": null, "alias_of": null, "body": "[{\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Where they meet Professor Formagia Cudge PHD who takes them to Dr Naxira Menine's quarters, where her body lies - feasted on by rats.

The chamber has an antichamber with a trap which has not been set off, but the party are warned. A Fractal Monomorphic Replicator with a hidden keypad.

The corridor is made up of a large cylindrical drum with a gangway, connecting the antichamber with the study. The barrel is lined with arcane radiators and, although it is static, the whole chamber feels as if it is tumbling.

If the trap is set off...

Energy fills the chamber, and you begin to feel the flow of air pushing against you causing your hairs to stand on end and spark with static electricity... Your flesh begins to welt and intense heat wracks through your body... Parts of your body are fractally replicated, with the approriate nerve endings etc. Random table here.

Study is full of magic and science parafinalia including stacked crates and geo political maps of foreign places. There is a significant ammount of rats here, gnawing at the body. They avoid going near the trap.

The chamber has large stained glass windows, but they are too warbled to see through other than being able to make out some exterior lighting.

Skill Table

\", \"id\": \"3f1745e1-fce0-41f0-975e-e5955ec3efde\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Fuxmup

After being saved from the rats, Fuxmup wants drugs to sell and use.

He hands the party his taking if they hand over some product.

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

He can offer to astral project for the party.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

Workshop

\", \"id\": \"864dc321-fe89-40fe-9bdf-4c8aa2c13511\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

The chamber has an antichamber with a trap which has not been set off, but the party are warned. A Fractal Monomorphic Replicator with a hidden keypad.

The corridor is made up of a large cylindrical drum with a gangway, connecting the antichamber with the study. The barrel is lined with arcane radiators and, although it is static, the whole chamber feels as if it is tumbling.

If the trap is set off...

Energy fills the chamber, and you begin to feel the flow of air pushing against you causing your hairs to stand on end and spark with static electricity... Your flesh begins to welt and intense heat wracks through your body... Parts of your body are fractally replicated, with the approriate nerve endings etc. Random table here.

Study is full of magic and science parafinalia including stacked crates and geo political maps of foreign places. There is a significant ammount of rats here, gnawing at the body. They avoid going near the trap.

The chamber has large stained glass windows, but they are too warbled to see through other than being able to make out some exterior lighting.

Skill Table

\", \"id\": \"3f1745e1-fce0-41f0-975e-e5955ec3efde\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Fuxmup

After being saved from the rats, Fuxmup wants drugs to sell and use.

He hands the party his taking if they hand over some product.

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

He can offer to astral project for the party.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

Workshop

\", \"id\": \"864dc321-fe89-40fe-9bdf-4c8aa2c13511\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

The corridor is made up of a large cylindrical drum with a gangway, connecting the antichamber with the study. The barrel is lined with arcane radiators and, although it is static, the whole chamber feels as if it is tumbling.

If the trap is set off...

Energy fills the chamber, and you begin to feel the flow of air pushing against you causing your hairs to stand on end and spark with static electricity... Your flesh begins to welt and intense heat wracks through your body... Parts of your body are fractally replicated, with the approriate nerve endings etc. Random table here.

Study is full of magic and science parafinalia including stacked crates and geo political maps of foreign places. There is a significant ammount of rats here, gnawing at the body. They avoid going near the trap.

The chamber has large stained glass windows, but they are too warbled to see through other than being able to make out some exterior lighting.

Skill Table

\", \"id\": \"3f1745e1-fce0-41f0-975e-e5955ec3efde\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Fuxmup

After being saved from the rats, Fuxmup wants drugs to sell and use.

He hands the party his taking if they hand over some product.

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

He can offer to astral project for the party.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

Workshop

\", \"id\": \"864dc321-fe89-40fe-9bdf-4c8aa2c13511\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

After being saved from the rats, Fuxmup wants drugs to sell and use.

He hands the party his taking if they hand over some product.

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

He can offer to astral project for the party.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

Workshop

\", \"id\": \"864dc321-fe89-40fe-9bdf-4c8aa2c13511\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

{"pk": 22, "path": "00010001000C0005", "depth": 4, "numchild": 0, "translation_key": "e1199025-9fb2-4716-9203-c8f7c56854dd", "locale": 1, "title": "University", "draft_title": "University", "slug": "university", "content_type": 61, "live": true, "has_unpublished_changes": true, "url_path": "/home/chapter/university/", "owner": null, "seo_title": "", "show_in_menus": false, "search_description": "", "go_live_at": null, "expire_at": null, "expired": false, "locked": false, "locked_at": null, "locked_by": null, "first_published_at": null, "last_published_at": null, "latest_revision_created_at": "2021-10-30T12:09:18.823Z", "live_revision": null, "alias_of": null, "body": "[{\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Where they meet Professor Formagia Cudge PHD who takes them to Dr Naxira Menine's quarters, where her body lies - feasted on by rats.

The chamber has an antichamber with a trap which has not been set off, but the party are warned. A Fractal Monomorphic Replicator with a hidden keypad.

The corridor is made up of a large cylindrical drum with a gangway, connecting the antichamber with the study. The barrel is lined with arcane radiators and, although it is static, the whole chamber feels as if it is tumbling.

If the trap is set off...

Energy fills the chamber, and you begin to feel the flow of air pushing against you causing your hairs to stand on end and spark with static electricity... Your flesh begins to welt and intense heat wracks through your body... Parts of your body are fractally replicated, with the approriate nerve endings etc. Random table here.

Study is full of magic and science parafinalia including stacked crates and geo political maps of foreign places. There is a significant ammount of rats here, gnawing at the body. They avoid going near the trap.

The chamber has large stained glass windows, but they are too warbled to see through other than being able to make out some exterior lighting.

Skill Table

\", \"id\": \"3f1745e1-fce0-41f0-975e-e5955ec3efde\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

He hands the party his taking if they hand over some product.

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

He can offer to astral project for the party.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

Workshop

\", \"id\": \"864dc321-fe89-40fe-9bdf-4c8aa2c13511\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

{"pk": 22, "path": "00010001000C0005", "depth": 4, "numchild": 0, "translation_key": "e1199025-9fb2-4716-9203-c8f7c56854dd", "locale": 1, "title": "University", "draft_title": "University", "slug": "university", "content_type": 61, "live": true, "has_unpublished_changes": true, "url_path": "/home/chapter/university/", "owner": null, "seo_title": "", "show_in_menus": false, "search_description": "", "go_live_at": null, "expire_at": null, "expired": false, "locked": false, "locked_at": null, "locked_by": null, "first_published_at": null, "last_published_at": null, "latest_revision_created_at": "2021-10-30T12:09:18.939Z", "live_revision": null, "alias_of": null, "body": "[{\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Where they meet Professor Formagia Cudge PHD who takes them to Dr Naxira Menine's quarters, where her body lies - feasted on by rats.

The chamber has an antichamber with a trap which has not been set off, but the party are warned. A Fractal Monomorphic Replicator with a hidden keypad.

The corridor is made up of a large cylindrical drum with a gangway, connecting the antichamber with the study. The barrel is lined with arcane radiators and, although it is static, the whole chamber feels as if it is tumbling.

If the trap is set off...

Energy fills the chamber, and you begin to feel the flow of air pushing against you causing your hairs to stand on end and spark with static electricity... Your flesh begins to welt and intense heat wracks through your body... Parts of your body are fractally replicated, with the approriate nerve endings etc. Random table here.

Study is full of magic and science parafinalia including stacked crates and geo political maps of foreign places. There is a significant ammount of rats here, gnawing at the body. They avoid going near the trap.

The chamber has large stained glass windows, but they are too warbled to see through other than being able to make out some exterior lighting.

Skill Table

\", \"id\": \"3f1745e1-fce0-41f0-975e-e5955ec3efde\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Fuxmup

After being saved from the rats, Fuxmup wants drugs to sell and use.

He hands the party his taking if they hand over some product.

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

He can offer to astral project for the party.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

Workshop

\", \"id\": \"864dc321-fe89-40fe-9bdf-4c8aa2c13511\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

The chamber has an antichamber with a trap which has not been set off, but the party are warned. A Fractal Monomorphic Replicator with a hidden keypad.

The corridor is made up of a large cylindrical drum with a gangway, connecting the antichamber with the study. The barrel is lined with arcane radiators and, although it is static, the whole chamber feels as if it is tumbling.

If the trap is set off...

Energy fills the chamber, and you begin to feel the flow of air pushing against you causing your hairs to stand on end and spark with static electricity... Your flesh begins to welt and intense heat wracks through your body... Parts of your body are fractally replicated, with the approriate nerve endings etc. Random table here.

Study is full of magic and science parafinalia including stacked crates and geo political maps of foreign places. There is a significant ammount of rats here, gnawing at the body. They avoid going near the trap.

The chamber has large stained glass windows, but they are too warbled to see through other than being able to make out some exterior lighting.

Skill Table

\", \"id\": \"3f1745e1-fce0-41f0-975e-e5955ec3efde\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Fuxmup

After being saved from the rats, Fuxmup wants drugs to sell and use.

He hands the party his taking if they hand over some product.

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

He can offer to astral project for the party.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

Workshop

\", \"id\": \"864dc321-fe89-40fe-9bdf-4c8aa2c13511\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

The corridor is made up of a large cylindrical drum with a gangway, connecting the antichamber with the study. The barrel is lined with arcane radiators and, although it is static, the whole chamber feels as if it is tumbling.

If the trap is set off...

Energy fills the chamber, and you begin to feel the flow of air pushing against you causing your hairs to stand on end and spark with static electricity... Your flesh begins to welt and intense heat wracks through your body... Parts of your body are fractally replicated, with the approriate nerve endings etc. Random table here.

Study is full of magic and science parafinalia including stacked crates and geo political maps of foreign places. There is a significant ammount of rats here, gnawing at the body. They avoid going near the trap.

The chamber has large stained glass windows, but they are too warbled to see through other than being able to make out some exterior lighting.

Skill Table

\", \"id\": \"3f1745e1-fce0-41f0-975e-e5955ec3efde\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Fuxmup

After being saved from the rats, Fuxmup wants drugs to sell and use.

He hands the party his taking if they hand over some product.

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

He can offer to astral project for the party.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

Workshop

\", \"id\": \"864dc321-fe89-40fe-9bdf-4c8aa2c13511\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

After being saved from the rats, Fuxmup wants drugs to sell and use.

He hands the party his taking if they hand over some product.

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

He can offer to astral project for the party.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

Workshop

\", \"id\": \"864dc321-fe89-40fe-9bdf-4c8aa2c13511\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

{"pk": 22, "path": "00010001000C0005", "depth": 4, "numchild": 0, "translation_key": "e1199025-9fb2-4716-9203-c8f7c56854dd", "locale": 1, "title": "University", "draft_title": "University", "slug": "university", "content_type": 61, "live": true, "has_unpublished_changes": true, "url_path": "/home/chapter/university/", "owner": null, "seo_title": "", "show_in_menus": false, "search_description": "", "go_live_at": null, "expire_at": null, "expired": false, "locked": false, "locked_at": null, "locked_by": null, "first_published_at": null, "last_published_at": null, "latest_revision_created_at": "2021-10-30T12:09:19.253Z", "live_revision": null, "alias_of": null, "body": "[{\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Where they meet Professor Formagia Cudge PHD who takes them to Dr Naxira Menine's quarters, where her body lies - feasted on by rats.

The chamber has an antichamber with a trap which has not been set off, but the party are warned. A Fractal Monomorphic Replicator with a hidden keypad.

The corridor is made up of a large cylindrical drum with a gangway, connecting the antichamber with the study. The barrel is lined with arcane radiators and, although it is static, the whole chamber feels as if it is tumbling.

If the trap is set off...

Energy fills the chamber, and you begin to feel the flow of air pushing against you causing your hairs to stand on end and spark with static electricity... Your flesh begins to welt and intense heat wracks through your body... Parts of your body are fractally replicated, with the approriate nerve endings etc. Random table here.

Study is full of magic and science parafinalia including stacked crates and geo political maps of foreign places. There is a significant ammount of rats here, gnawing at the body. They avoid going near the trap.

The chamber has large stained glass windows, but they are too warbled to see through other than being able to make out some exterior lighting.

Skill Table

\", \"id\": \"3f1745e1-fce0-41f0-975e-e5955ec3efde\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

He can offer to astral project for the party.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

Workshop

\", \"id\": \"864dc321-fe89-40fe-9bdf-4c8aa2c13511\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

{"pk": 22, "path": "00010001000C0005", "depth": 4, "numchild": 0, "translation_key": "e1199025-9fb2-4716-9203-c8f7c56854dd", "locale": 1, "title": "University", "draft_title": "University", "slug": "university", "content_type": 61, "live": true, "has_unpublished_changes": true, "url_path": "/home/chapter/university/", "owner": null, "seo_title": "", "show_in_menus": false, "search_description": "", "go_live_at": null, "expire_at": null, "expired": false, "locked": false, "locked_at": null, "locked_by": null, "first_published_at": null, "last_published_at": null, "latest_revision_created_at": "2021-10-30T12:09:19.349Z", "live_revision": null, "alias_of": null, "body": "[{\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Where they meet Professor Formagia Cudge PHD who takes them to Dr Naxira Menine's quarters, where her body lies - feasted on by rats.

The chamber has an antichamber with a trap which has not been set off, but the party are warned. A Fractal Monomorphic Replicator with a hidden keypad.

The corridor is made up of a large cylindrical drum with a gangway, connecting the antichamber with the study. The barrel is lined with arcane radiators and, although it is static, the whole chamber feels as if it is tumbling.

If the trap is set off...

Energy fills the chamber, and you begin to feel the flow of air pushing against you causing your hairs to stand on end and spark with static electricity... Your flesh begins to welt and intense heat wracks through your body... Parts of your body are fractally replicated, with the approriate nerve endings etc. Random table here.

Study is full of magic and science parafinalia including stacked crates and geo political maps of foreign places. There is a significant ammount of rats here, gnawing at the body. They avoid going near the trap.

The chamber has large stained glass windows, but they are too warbled to see through other than being able to make out some exterior lighting.

Skill Table

\", \"id\": \"3f1745e1-fce0-41f0-975e-e5955ec3efde\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Fuxmup

After being saved from the rats, Fuxmup wants drugs to sell and use.

He hands the party his taking if they hand over some product.

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

He can offer to astral project for the party.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

Workshop

\", \"id\": \"864dc321-fe89-40fe-9bdf-4c8aa2c13511\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

The chamber has an antichamber with a trap which has not been set off, but the party are warned. A Fractal Monomorphic Replicator with a hidden keypad.

The corridor is made up of a large cylindrical drum with a gangway, connecting the antichamber with the study. The barrel is lined with arcane radiators and, although it is static, the whole chamber feels as if it is tumbling.

If the trap is set off...

Energy fills the chamber, and you begin to feel the flow of air pushing against you causing your hairs to stand on end and spark with static electricity... Your flesh begins to welt and intense heat wracks through your body... Parts of your body are fractally replicated, with the approriate nerve endings etc. Random table here.

Study is full of magic and science parafinalia including stacked crates and geo political maps of foreign places. There is a significant ammount of rats here, gnawing at the body. They avoid going near the trap.

The chamber has large stained glass windows, but they are too warbled to see through other than being able to make out some exterior lighting.

Skill Table

\", \"id\": \"3f1745e1-fce0-41f0-975e-e5955ec3efde\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Fuxmup

After being saved from the rats, Fuxmup wants drugs to sell and use.

He hands the party his taking if they hand over some product.

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

He can offer to astral project for the party.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

Workshop

\", \"id\": \"864dc321-fe89-40fe-9bdf-4c8aa2c13511\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

The corridor is made up of a large cylindrical drum with a gangway, connecting the antichamber with the study. The barrel is lined with arcane radiators and, although it is static, the whole chamber feels as if it is tumbling.

If the trap is set off...

Energy fills the chamber, and you begin to feel the flow of air pushing against you causing your hairs to stand on end and spark with static electricity... Your flesh begins to welt and intense heat wracks through your body... Parts of your body are fractally replicated, with the approriate nerve endings etc. Random table here.

Study is full of magic and science parafinalia including stacked crates and geo political maps of foreign places. There is a significant ammount of rats here, gnawing at the body. They avoid going near the trap.

The chamber has large stained glass windows, but they are too warbled to see through other than being able to make out some exterior lighting.

Skill Table

\", \"id\": \"3f1745e1-fce0-41f0-975e-e5955ec3efde\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Fuxmup

After being saved from the rats, Fuxmup wants drugs to sell and use.

He hands the party his taking if they hand over some product.

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

He can offer to astral project for the party.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

Workshop

\", \"id\": \"864dc321-fe89-40fe-9bdf-4c8aa2c13511\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

After being saved from the rats, Fuxmup wants drugs to sell and use.

He hands the party his taking if they hand over some product.

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

He can offer to astral project for the party.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

Workshop

\", \"id\": \"864dc321-fe89-40fe-9bdf-4c8aa2c13511\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}

{"pk": 22, "path": "00010001000C0005", "depth": 4, "numchild": 0, "translation_key": "e1199025-9fb2-4716-9203-c8f7c56854dd", "locale": 1, "title": "University", "draft_title": "University", "slug": "university", "content_type": 61, "live": true, "has_unpublished_changes": true, "url_path": "/home/chapter/university/", "owner": null, "seo_title": "", "show_in_menus": false, "search_description": "", "go_live_at": null, "expire_at": null, "expired": false, "locked": false, "locked_at": null, "locked_by": null, "first_published_at": null, "last_published_at": null, "latest_revision_created_at": "2021-10-30T12:09:19.645Z", "live_revision": null, "alias_of": null, "body": "[{\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

Where they meet Professor Formagia Cudge PHD who takes them to Dr Naxira Menine's quarters, where her body lies - feasted on by rats.

The chamber has an antichamber with a trap which has not been set off, but the party are warned. A Fractal Monomorphic Replicator with a hidden keypad.

The corridor is made up of a large cylindrical drum with a gangway, connecting the antichamber with the study. The barrel is lined with arcane radiators and, although it is static, the whole chamber feels as if it is tumbling.

If the trap is set off...

Energy fills the chamber, and you begin to feel the flow of air pushing against you causing your hairs to stand on end and spark with static electricity... Your flesh begins to welt and intense heat wracks through your body... Parts of your body are fractally replicated, with the approriate nerve endings etc. Random table here.

Study is full of magic and science parafinalia including stacked crates and geo political maps of foreign places. There is a significant ammount of rats here, gnawing at the body. They avoid going near the trap.

The chamber has large stained glass windows, but they are too warbled to see through other than being able to make out some exterior lighting.

Skill Table

\", \"id\": \"3f1745e1-fce0-41f0-975e-e5955ec3efde\"}, {\"type\": \"paragraph\", \"value\": \"

If asked he has strange premonitions about rats nests hidden in high places.

Broken glass, shiny bits, kaleidescope, mirros and Kosmimancy (not Cosmomancy).

Part needs to work out where the rat man was hiding.

There are various clues including Fuxmup's astral projection.

Workshop

\", \"id\": \"864dc321-fe89-40fe-9bdf-4c8aa2c13511\"}]", "comments": [], "page_tags": []}
